Afridza Munandar, Rider Indonesia Berprestasi yang Tewas di Asia Talent Cup Sepang
02 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dunia balap motor kembali berduka. Pebalap muda asal Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, meninggal dunia dalam balapan pertama (Race 1) Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) di Sepang, Malaysia, pada Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pebalap kelahiran Tasikmalaya, Jawa Barat, ini mengalami kecelakaan di Tikungan 10 pada lap pertama. Usai mendapatkan perawatan medis dari petugas trek, ia ditransfer ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur dengan helikopter. Sayangnya, nyawa Afridza tak tertolong.
Afridza merupakan pebalap yang kerap mengharumkan nama Indonesia di kancah IATC. Musim ini, pebalap berusia 20 tahun itu bahkan menjadi berpeluang merebut gelar juara jika mampu tampil gemilang di Sepang.
text:
Afridza Munandar, an Indonesian Rider who died at the Sepang Asia Talent Cup
02 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The world of motor racing is back in mourning. The young racer from Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, died in the first race (Race 1) Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) in Sepang, Malaysia, on Saturday (11/02/2019).
The racer born in Tasikmalaya, West Java, had an accident in Bend 10 on the first lap. After getting medical treatment from the track officer, he was transferred to Kuala Lumpur Hospital by helicopter. Unfortunately, Afridza's life was beyond help.
Afridza is a racer who often lives up to Indonesia's name in the IATC arena. This season, the 20-year-old rider even has a chance to win the title if he can perform brilliantly in Sepang.
